fields.Name: Vasco De Gama
fields.Description: Vasco De Gama set sail from Portugal in search of a route to the Indies around Africa.  The first part of his voyage was to the Cape of Good Hope

fields.Name: Columbus
fields.Description: Columbus sailed for Spain in search of a shorter route to the Indies; instead he found islands off what we now call America

fields.Name: Ponce De Leon
fields.Description: After Columbus, many adventures searched the New World for Fame, Fortune, and Glory.  Ponce de Leon found Florida

fields.Name: Cape of New Hope
fields.Description: From the Cape of Good Hope, Portuguese sailors continued around Africa to the Indies and beyond
